mapper.insert: INSERT INTO eml_rcv_tb(rcv_eml_sq,stf_snd_sq,eml_sq, ipt_sq, rcv_dt) VALUES(SEQ_RCV_EML.NEXTVAL,#{stf_snd_sq}, (SELECT eml_sq from eml_tb where eml_sq = (SELECT MAX(eml_sq)AS eml_sq FROM eml_tb)),1,SYSDATE)
INSERT INTO eml_snd_tb(snd_eml_sq,snd_rcv_sq,eml_sq,snd_dt) VALUES(SEQ_SND_EML.NEXTVAL,#{stf_rcv_sq}, (SELECT eml_sq from eml_tb where eml_sq = (SELECT MAX(eml_sq)AS eml_sq FROM eml_tb)),SYSDATE)
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*)AS CNT FROM EML_RCV_TB WHERE ipt_sq=1 and stf_snd_sq=#{stf_rcv_sq}
SELECT ROWNUM AS RNUM ,B.*, A.STF_SND_SQ, A.RCV_DT FROM(SELECT * FROM EML_RCV_TB WHERE ipt_sq=1 AND stf_snd_sq=#{stf_rcv_sq} ORDER BY rcv_eml_sq DESC)A, EML_TB B WHERE A.EML_SQ = B.EML_SQ

SELECT B.eml_sq, B.eml_pl_nm, B.eml_pl_crs, B.eml_nm, A.stf_snd_sq, B.eml_cnt, to_char(A.rcv_dt,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') as rcv_dt FROM EML_RCV_TB A, EML_TB B WHERE A.EML_SQ = B.EML_SQ AND A.EML_SQ=#{eml_sq} ORDER BY B.EML_SQ ASC
